author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Trading Emissions ‍Announce Sale Of Italian Solar Asset​
text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - Trading Emissions Plc:
* ‍ANNOUNCE SALE OF ITS REMAINING SOLAR OPERATING SUBSIDIARY, SOLAR ENERGY ITALIA 1 SRL​
* ‍NET PROCEEDS FROM SALE OF SEI1, AFTER ALLOWING FOR TRANSACTION AND OTHER COSTS, ARE ESTIMATED TO BE EUR7.97 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
